channel.title: My Thought so far
channel.description: Hey this is just going to be a quick post. I've got as far as the rails just after you kill the giant flame thrower alien. I just wanted to quickly register and say that so far the new music in the game has been fantastic, it's really stood out as i have been playing it and really gets me into the game. Well done for all the people that worked on it and in this case especially the music team, I'm really loving the tunes so far, thanks for the awesome remake :slight_smile:

item.title: My Thought so far
item.dc:creator: Dotard
item.description:
Music is so far one of the better parts of the mod

Read full topic

item.title: My Thought so far
item.dc:creator: YinTangAlex
item.description:
Hey this is just going to be a quick post. I’ve got as far as the rails just after you kill the giant flame thrower alien. I just wanted to quickly register and say that so far the new music in the game has been fantastic, it’s really stood out as i have been playing it and really gets me into the game. Well done for all the people that worked on it and in this case especially the music team, I’m really loving the tunes so far, thanks for the awesome remake
